docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 29 Educators and doctors should spend less time cursing LSD and more time telling students the facts about it, a physician from California said here today.

headline.main: A PHYSICIAN URGES LSD FACTS BE TOLD; Californian Says Use of Drug Reaches Epidemic Scale

docs.abstract: Dr D Fisher urges data on effects of LSD and other hallucinatory drugs be made available to hs and coll students, s, Amer Coll Health Assn
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 29 Educators and doctors should spend less time cursing LSD and more time telling students the facts about it, a physician from California said here today.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times
